NPCs.Name: Old Man
NPCs.Description: A wise old man with a long beard.
NPCs.InitialDescription: An old man stands here, stroking his beard thoughtfully.

NPCs.Name: Professor Jon
NPCs.InitialDescription: Professor Jon is here, ready to give you your first Pokémon!
NPCs.Dialogue: Welcome to the world of Pokémon! Here, take this Pokédex and choose your starter.
